name: MICSI
long_description: MICSI is introducing AI software that doubles resolution and halves scan time. This breakthrough enables imaging centers to significantly enhance their capacity and patient throughput, potentially saving countless lives and generating an additional $2 million of revenue per MRI scanner. Our initial offering serves as a stepping stone toward the companyâ€™s larger vision of transforming the MRI into a truly quantitative instrument that is capable of providing highly reproducible data for more accurate diagnoses and patient management.
one_liner: Higher resolution MRI with faster scan times.
